purpose: To provide an AI-driven search and answer engine for workplace knowledge retrieval and integration
principle: Utilizes large language models (LLMs) and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) techniques to deliver accurate and context-aware search results
reusability: Offers integration capabilities with various enterprise systems and APIs, customizable for different organizational needs
limitations: May require significant setup for integration with existing enterprise systems, performance dependent on LLM size and data volume
name: xyne
description: AI-first Search & Answer Engine for work. Open-source alternative to Glean.
highlight: Open-source alternative to Glean for enterprise search and knowledge retrieval
